title: What is the interpretation of a dream about being afraid of a mouse in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Being afraid of a mouse in a dream Seeing a mouse in a dream is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer search for its correct meaning because it makes him feel fear and panic and because the interpretation of seeing dreams varies according to people and places, and we will present in you the interpretation of the dream of being afraid of a mouse in a dream through the greatest Arab scholars and dream interpreters. What is the interpretation? Dreaming of being afraid of a mouse in a dream? Seeing a house containing a large number of mice is evidence that there are problems and fears in the dreamer’s life, but they will end soon. As for seeing mice in the Virgin’s bed while she is sleeping, this indicates the presence of a hypocritical person in the girl’s life, and soon her deception will be exposed. This person. The dream of being afraid of a mouse in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the end of the problem she is suffering from, and seeing a mouse eating food is evidence that she is losing something valuable in the girl’s life. Seeing her holding the mouse is evidence that there are those who speak ill of her and show her love. With her, and she must be careful of those around her. Interpretation of a dream about being afraid of a mouse in a married woman’s dream is evidence of debts and fears in her life and that they will end in the coming period. As for seeing a mouse above his head and screaming in fear, this is a sign of exhaustion and illness that he has been suffering from for a long time. Fear A mouse in the house in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of anxiety and fear of the approaching date of birth. To see a mouse dying in her bed is evidence of an incomplete pregnancy, and God Almighty will carry her again. The fear of a mouse in a widow’s house is evidence of great sadness for the deceased husband, and seeing it Killing the mouse is evidence of the end of sadness and anxiety in her life. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing fear of a mouse in a dream? Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing fear of a mouse in a dream and trying to escape from it in a virgin’s dream is evidence of the end of a girl’s relationship with an inappropriate young man. Seeing fear of Mice in a wife’s dream portend trouble, but if she sees that they are trying to kill him, but he escapes, then this is evidence of a lot of debt. Seeing a black mouse in a man’s dream is a sign of many worries and troubles that he suffers from, while a white mouse expresses a simple problem from which the dreamer will escape without Difficulty. A yellow mouse in a dream is undesirable and indicates that the dreamer is experiencing a health problem himself or someone close to him. The vision also expresses the evil, deception and cunning that characterize the dreamer. Dreaming of a red mouse is an expression of a man’s anger, irritation and excessive tension, which leads to Cutting off his relationship with others, and killing them expresses his salvation from enemies in his life. Seeing mice playing in the dreamer’s bed indicates his wife’s betrayal and her deviation from his obedience, and he must reconsider his relationship with her. Ibn Sirin says about the large number of mice in a man’s dream that it is an expression of the presence of many women. The bad things in his life, and he must stay away from them so that he is not harmed. So mice gather in a dream, a vision that is not good. A mouse coming out of the body’s organs, especially the anus, expresses a man’s connection with a corrupt and vile woman, or that one of the man’s children is not in a state of purity. Fear Of the mouse and worry about it expression p

A mouse coming out of the body’s organs, especially the anus, expresses a man’s connection with a corrupt and vile woman, or that one of the man’s children is not in a state of purity. title: Interpretation of reeds in a dream Reeds in a dream

preview.html: Seeing sugarcane in a dream means buying and drinking sugarcane juice for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and more interpretations in the rest of the article. Sugarcane juice in a dream. It is one of the dreams that brings us great happiness and goodness, as sugarcane is one of the important things in general life, which people must eat, whether it is juice or as it is, to obtain the important benefits that it offers us. Interpretation of reeds in a dream. Reeds in a dream denote people’s rice, and sugar cane denotes a difficult diet, and seeing it peeled means safety. If you see in a dream that you are holding a reed in your hand and leaning on it from time to time, this indicates extreme exhaustion that you are suffering from in a dream. Your life and the poverty you suffer or may suffer in the future. , and the rod is the link that you are looking for, but do not always find. Canes in a dream also indicate bad circumstances and abuse of others and can be a sign of some litigation, courts and warrants, especially if you see that the cane in front of you is constantly falling. In addition, if you dream that you You chew sugar cane, specifically sugar cane, as this is a sign of a lot of gossip about something that affects you directly or indirectly, but your conversations about it help reduce your influence on gossip, so stand up for yourself and accept your opinions about others. Since sugar cane is in your dream It brings you a lot of good, it shows abundant profit and wealth. – If you see that you are tightening the cane, this is an indication of the great benefits that you can benefit from some professional projects in your life, which will help you succeed. The process of pressing is evidence of fatigue and the juice is a good and good product. Interpretation of canes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing canes in a dream that are rotten and have a dull color is evidence that the dreamer is very deceitful in public life and takes his money unjustly and that he will suffer from evil and misfortunes in his life. Seeing a large number of Of reeds in a dream in all places around the dreamer is evidence that the dreamer suffers from the interference of many people in his life, as there are many who speak against him with unrealistic words. Seeing an unmarried woman buying reeds in a dream and eating it completely and it was sweet in taste is evidence that she will get Money and livelihood in public life, this indicates a lot of kindness and marriage to a person of good morals. A married woman who buys a cane in a dream is evidence that she will become pregnant soon, and her pregnancy and birth will go smoothly and she and the fetus will not suffer from any health problems. If a married woman sees that her husband is buying a cane for her in a dream, this means that the husband will obtain a lot of money and livelihood and that His circumstances will change for the better. Interpretation of reeds in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Whoever dreams of many reeds, this indicates that something will happen with a little fatigue. As for reeds, people interpret their greatness according to their size. As for the sugar cane, it was presented at his door and place. And whoever dreams: He has a cane in his hand and he is leaning on it, then he remains young and dies in poverty. As for the vision of the sugarcane

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about talking to someone I know according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream when talking to someone I know. A person’s speech is the correct key to knowing his personality, and exchanging conversations brings warmth of feelings or a way to get to know each other and, according to psychologists, develops mental abilities. Interpretation of a dream when talking to someone you know carries many interpretations and expresses many conflicting feelings that can be Love, excitement, mystery, or fear. What is the interpretation of a dream about talking to someone I know? Most often, a dream about talking to someone you know is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to increase his knowledge, skills, and culture in life, increase his relationships and adventures, and enjoy his earthly life, health, and blessings. The Creator is upon him. It can also indicate that a person feels very curious and suspicious about a certain character and wants to get to know him and know his secrets. Some jurists also mentioned that it is an indication of the presence of a character that occupies the mind of the fortuneteller and he does not stop thinking about it around the clock and he tried hard to get it out of his mind but could not. In this. It may indicate that there is a very mysterious figure in the life of the dreamer, who feels that he is hiding many secrets and perhaps many evil deeds and wants to know about them. True. Many commentators agree that this vision can be interpreted differently, depending on the nature of The conversation and its form, as well as what is the result of the conversation or how it ended. If a long conversation ends with a handshake, this is an indication that there will be a reconciliation between two people who had great animosity with each other, causing many problems in the past. But if one of the parties ends in Conversation By giving something to the other, this conveys a message of reassurance to the dreamer that the person who is afraid of betraying and betraying him, is the exact opposite of what he believes, as he put it. He is an honest and real person. But the conversation that is an argument and verbal quarrel is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to excel over his peers at work and prove his outstanding intellectual skills and abilities in order to obtain better opportunities in life. As for the one who is scattered with laughter and smiling from time to time, this is good news for starting a relationship. New with a good personality, which will be the best support and link in life. Interpretation of dreams about talking to someone I know by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of this vision depends on the way it is expressed, its voice and tone, whether it brings happiness or fear, as well as the style of exchanging dialogue. If he sees If a person speaks to another person harshly and angrily, this is a sign of his feeling of injustice and wrongdoing and his desire to escape from his surroundings and scream at those who wronged him. If the voice is loud but has a happy tone, this indicates the existence of a strong relationship between the two parties in the conversation and it may be an emotional connection or Jealousy and passion. If the conversation is accompanied by a conflict of obscene words, then this expresses a quarrel or difficult problems that will arise between him and someone close to him, leading to a long separation between them. If the conversation takes the form of an attack and one of the parties is unable to speak harshly, this means that the dreamer feels That there is a great danger threatening his life and he needs help because he cannot ward off

title: Interpretation of a dream I dreamt that I was stealing in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, the most accurate interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of being stolen in a dream. We provided an interpretation of a dream of being stolen in a dream through the encyclopedia website that stealing is one of the things that should not be done, because God forbids theft. Seeing a person stealing from himself is one of the thorny matters that raises controversy in the same opinion. What does it mean that I am stealing, what is meant by what I have stolen, and many questions are running through the mind of God. The meanings of the dream differ from one person to another, and the vision of stealing for a married woman differs from the interpretation of a single woman who sees herself stealing, as well as the interpretation of a man, and the dreamer is the one who saw. It is the same as the one who steals or the opinion of the one who steals. In the following paragraphs that we present to you through the Encyclopedia of Dream Interpretation, we will discuss the vision of someone stealing from the great dream interpreters such as Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen and the interpretation of the dream. For different situations, whether married, pregnant, single, or male. Interpretation of dreams: I was stealing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees his money stolen is an evil omen, as it indicates that he will suffer a great loss. Ibn Sirin showed that whoever sees himself stealing gold, this indicates However, he will reach a higher position. Ben Sirin also explains that seeing someone stealing gold is an indication that he will be able to achieve his goals and ambitions. When a married woman sees that she is stealing money and then runs away with what she stole, this indicates that she is suffering from many difficulties and hardships in her life and that she wants Getting rid of all these worries and worries. Ibn Sirin believes that when a pregnant woman sees herself stealing something, this indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child and the birth will be easy. Ibn Sirin also dreamed of seeing an unmarried girl stealing herself in a dream, this is one of the praiseworthy visions because it It indicates that she will achieve her goals and reach her goal. Interpretation of dreams: I was stealing in a dream from Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi sees that stealing in a dream is not a dream worthy of praise, but it may be praiseworthy in some cases where it is good evidence, except for someone who wants to be deceived. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the person who Seeing himself stealing in a dream indicates that he is making a big mistake in reality and that he is doing what he fears those around him will discover. Al-Nabulsi explains that whoever sees himself eavesdropping or stealing is constantly lying and doing what God and His Messenger have forbidden. And whoever sees someone else knows who is stealing, this indicates However, the monarch benefits from what the thief steals, whether what he steals is work that benefits him, or art, or something else. Al-Nabulsi pointed out that if a married man sees someone stealing the utensils of his home, this is an unpleasant vision because it symbolizes the death of the wife, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: theft in a dream Married Woman: When a married woman sees that she is stealing gold and then running away with it, this indicates that she is suffering from problems and facing many difficulties in her life, and she shows her strong desire to get rid of all of this and leave. Ben Sirin sees that the dreaming woman who steals something in her dream was able to escape from the police. She can achieve her goals and hear happy news in the coming period of her life. Interpretation of dreams: I was stealing in a dream for a single woman. If a girl sees herself stealing in a dream

title: Interpretation of dreams about hunting and the symbols it carries

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hunting: The longing for the symbols that dreams bring to us. The interpretation of a dream about hunting carries many connotations, some good and some bad, so many Arab scholars interpreted this vision in its various topics. Imam Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of hunting for men. The Imam of Galilee interpreted many visions, including: Interpretation of a dream about hunting, presented by the website Today is different to all dear followers. If a man sees that he is catching fish without using his hand to catch and also feels hungry, then this vision indicates a lot of goodness and benefit that he and all his family members will receive in the near future. If one sees that he is fishing and he is actually a man He fears God in his actions, so this dream is evidence of the happiness he enjoys from the goodness that he will obtain after a while. Ibn Sirin also indicated that fishing and leaving the sea dead is a vision that warns that God must be taken into account in all actions and words that the dreamer performs. In his real life.If a man sees that he is catching fish from the sea and your fish comes out with pearls, this is evidence of marriage to a woman with character, and he will be happy to be associated with her and it will be the reason for a lot of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married man. If a married man sees in a dream that he is catching a fish, this is a sign of financial stability. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married man indicates that he will travel to the sea and make a lot of living from this trip. Catching fish in a dream for a married person indicates that The dreamer is struggling to earn a lawful life in real life. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a single girl. Seeing fishing using the hand without a tool indicates that the visionary does a lot of research before entering into a romantic relationship. Interpretation of a dream about fishing without a hook for a single girl, this is a sign that he is facing a lot of work and a sign On not trusting others. Whoever sees in his dream that he is catching a lot of fish is evidence that he is surrounded by a group of hadiths that are not beneficial to him. Ibn Sirin also indicated that the vision of fishing for one girl indicates that she will engage in a dialogue with many people and will not find meaning in this. Dialogue. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about grilled fish? Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman. If a married woman sees a lot of fish in her dream, this is a sign of the livelihood that she and all her family members will gain and it will be a source of joy and happiness for everyone. If a married woman sees that her husband is offering her Fish, this is evidence that she will soon become pregnant in the same year in which she had the dream. Seeing a fish in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will receive happy news that will bring her happiness and joy. Seeing fish in a married woman’s dream is a sign of stability in marital life and understanding with Husband. Seeing grilled fish in a married woman’s dream indicates that there are some people who hate the fortune teller and he shows a lot of jealousy and hatred, so he should be prevented. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a pregnant woman. Seeing fishing in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will enjoy many benefits and advantages. Interpretation indicates

Seeing grilled fish in a married woman’s dream indicates that there are some people who hate the fortune teller and he shows a lot of jealousy and hatred, so he should be prevented. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a pregnant woman. Seeing fishing in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will enjoy many benefits and advantages. Interpretation indicates

title: Interpretation of treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin, is one of the visions that many people love because people in general always have the desire to find a treasure to solve all their problems that are usually related to the financial situation, but the meaning of the event in reality remains different from the dream, so whoever believes that the disturbing things in a dream, like the disturbing in reality and vice versa, were completely wrong, is not necessarily what represents us well in real life that carries the same dream person. Interpretation of treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married woman’s treasure is good news of pregnancy, and that if the vision contains a treasure of silver, it is a sign of pregnancy in the woman, but if the treasure is full. In gold, this indicates that they gave birth to a male child. Ibn Sirin also believes that seeing a treasure in a dream is generally a sign of abundant sustenance, abundant money, increased sustenance and money, and expanding the dreamer's business. Ibn Sirin believes that the treasure always comes in a dream in the form of a gift or a reward for an action or punishment for the dreamer, for example: And whoever thinks that he is digging for a treasure but it is buried underground, this is evidence of study and learning, as writing is nothing but an engraving in letters. An indication of the dreamer's inheritance of a large sum of money, but if this water is a sea, the inheritance will now be out of reach, and if it is a river, it will approach the dreamer. And if the treasure is filled with silver, it is a sign of high knowledge and religion, but if it is filled with gold, this indicates benevolence if it is winter and punishment if it is summer. And if the treasure is filled with diamonds, it is a sign of a woman, but she is kind and helps her husband. As for the one who finds a fake treasure, he has a lot of knowledge, but it is of no benefit. If his treasure was stolen after he found it, this is evidence of his being robbed of the dreamer's work. Interpretation of a treasure of Pharaonic antiquities in a dream Whoever sees a treasure in his dream, but it is full of Pharaonic antiquities, this is evidence of the dreamer's protection from envy, malice and hatred, especially if these antiquities are made of gold and the Pharaonic antiquities are general. A sign of abundant goodness and abundance, it is deadly with the rich or the genius of the dreamer. As for Islamic antiquities, they indicate that the dreamer traveled to Mecca, Medina or Jerusalem, and the dreamer may marry from there. As for if the antiquities are from the Phoenicians, they indicate that the fortune teller traveled to the Levant, and the fortune teller may marry from his people. Interpretation of searching for treasure in a dream Seeing the earth in a dream and extracting a treasure from it has many indications. It is a sign of kindness, determination and strength for the dreamer that enables him to achieve what he wants and wants. There are indications of the good news that comes in succession to the seer to gladden his heart. Interpretation of seeing a treasure in a dream for a single woman Seeing a treasure in the dream of an unmarried or unmarried girl indicates the good news that is on its way, whether it is an engagement, a close marriage, academic excellence, success and success, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a treasure in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman treasure in her dream is a harbinger of her imminent pregnancy, especially if her husband gives it to her in a dream.

Interpretation of treasure in a dream for a married woman: A married woman seeing treasure in her dream is a harbinger of her imminent pregnancy, especially if her husband gives it to her in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about jewelry in a dream by Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about jewelry: Jewelry is considered one of the most important goods that women care about and always seek to buy. It is worth noting that a woman seeing jewelry in her dream means joy and happiness, but scholars have another opinion regarding seeing jewelry in a dream, and this is what we will explain to you in this article. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing jewelry in a dream for a married woman according to Al-Osaimi. Al-Osaimi says that seeing buying jewelry in a dream for a married woman indicates On happiness, kindness, pleasure and understanding between family members. On the other hand, seeing jewelry sold in a married woman’s dream indicates problems and issues between spouses and a lot of strife in the home. But seeing stolen jewelry in a married woman’s dream means that there will be a big problem or misfortune in Her life is due to her haste in making decisions. Interpretation of seeing jewelry in a man’s dream by Al-Osaimi. Seeing precious stones in a bank in a man’s dream indicates saving money, growth, and success at work. It also indicates that the situation will change for the better, God willing. As for seeing fake precious stones in a man’s dream, this indicates On deception and cunning in the life of the dreamer. While buying jewelry in a man’s dream means earning a living and money, but if the man is not married, this indicates imminent marriage and indicates pregnancy or childbearing for the married man. Interpretation of seeing jewelry in a dream for a single girl, Al-Usaimi said. About a girl who sees jewelry in a dream, that this indicates happiness and good news, or a sign of an approaching engagement or relationship with a generous and wealthy person. As for buying jewelry in a girl’s dream, it indicates the fulfillment of all the girl’s desires and an increase in livelihood and abundance of money. Interpretation of seeing jewelry in a dream By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of seeing jewelry in a dream as follows: Ibn Sirin said that seeing jewelry in a dream means kindness and livelihood, in addition to that if a woman sees jewelry in a dream, this means hearing happy news and happy occasions. But if a woman sees colorful jewelry in her dream, this means hearing happy news and happy occasions. It indicates the death of worries and the satisfaction of all desires and ambitions in that woman’s life, and seeing buying jewelry in a dream for a man or woman indicates making money. And changing the situation for the better, and this is what Ibn Sirin said. As for seeing fake jewelry in a dream for a man or woman, it is an undesirable dream, because it indicates that the dreamer is a fake, hypocritical, arrogant, and psychologically unstable person. In addition to seeing jewelry in a dream for an unmarried girl, It means success and the fulfillment of desires, whether in practice or in her social life. Such as engagement or marriage, and God knows best. In addition, seeing a jeweler in an unmarried girl’s dream means happiness and pleasure, and she has heard a lot of happy news, progress and success in her life. Friends. In addition to seeing the loss of jewelry in a dream, this indicates unhappiness and sadness and is usually due to a failed romantic relationship. On the other hand, seeing jewelry in a dream for a woman

title: Interpretation of dreams about roasted chickpeas in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing roasted chickpeas in a dream means good and comfortable living and other interpretations that we will explain to a single, married, pregnant, or divorced man, such as eating roasted chickpeas, roasting chickpeas. Preparing roasted chickpeas, or buying roasted chickpeas according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and others in: Interpretation of baked chickpeas in a dream Seeing roasted chickpeas in a dream shows that the dreamer or those around him will get sick, and that he will live with a health problem, especially liver disease. Eating roasted chickpeas in a dream For sick people, it is An indication of recovery after the illness continues for a period, and sometimes it indicates a beautiful life between spouses, continued happiness and peace, and enjoying the blessings of the world and benefiting from them. Seeing roasted chickpeas in a dream indicates a high salary or profit that envious people aspire to, so one must beware of envy, Seeing roasted chickpeas also shows that the dreamer's income is not blessed. He divides any profit or salary that goes into debts, and he will have nothing left. The dreamer works hard and gets his salary every month, and since he has no other source of livelihood, this means that he will face difficulty at the end of the month, but he will not lose his joy because of this, and he will work To regulate his mood and meet his needs so that this difficult situation does not affect his home in his family. Seeing roasted chickpea crumbs in a dream is a symbol of destruction and annihilation, and seeing this dream indicates that you will be busy and will put effort into idle work that will not benefit you later, and sometimes this dream is interpreted The money you get will only last for a short time. The pleasure of life is short-lived and temporary, and in some cases it refers to the afterlife and engaging in the empty work of this world and leaving it in life after death. Seeing a baked chickpea seller in a dream is someone who makes people taste the pleasures of this world and keeps them away from the afterlife. It brings them closer to the pleasures of life, so this person becomes the cause of their sins. Anyone who sees himself selling roasted chickpeas in a dream indicates the appearance of an inappropriate person in the life of the fortuneteller. He will become one of his friends, and sometimes roasted chickpeas in a dream are interpreted as a reference to a doctor in the hospital, where the dreamer is sick and goes to the doctor. Seeing baked chickpea sugar in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have the right mood in his life and will eliminate lack of ability and poverty. In his family and he will not face any problems. Seeing sweet roasted chickpeas in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be happy and calm, especially in his marriage, in which he will find happiness. Seeing dried roasted chickpeas in a dream indicates the abundance and abundance of the dreamer’s livelihood and the abundance of goodness and blessings in his home. Interpretation of buying baked chickpeas in a dream: seeing buying chickpeas Baked in a dream is a sign that God will bless whoever buys roasted chickpeas with a lot of goodness and blessings, and it shows that you will earn your livelihood in beautiful ways, earn money easily, do the work that you love and live in a world full of happiness and luxury, sometimes it indicates occupying an empty job and the fact that others try to give advice It will not bring you any benefit in anything

Seeing baked chickpea sugar in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have the right mood in his life and will eliminate the lack of ability and poverty in his family and will not face any problems. Seeing sweet roasted chickpeas in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be happy and calm, especially in his marriage, as he will find happiness in it. Seeing dried roasted chickpeas in a dream indicates the abundance and abundance of the dreamer's livelihood and the abundance of goodness and blessings in his home. title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing a dead person crying in a dream can be a sign that he is actually taking the same path as this dead man. If one sees in a dream the crying of the dead mother and father, this indicates the necessity of supplication. The crying of the dead father in a dream about the daughter may be an indication of the bad condition in which the fortune teller finds himself. Interpretation of the crying of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a dead person screaming and screaming in a dream indicates that this dead person will be tormented in his grave, and God knows best. If one sees a dead person he knows crying and suffering from severe pain in a dream, this is an indication that one is suffering from severe torment. As for seeing the dead crying without a voice or pain, this is a sign of his comfort and joy in the afterlife. If a married woman sees that her dead husband is crying loudly in a dream. This is evidence of his anger towards her, and that he did many things that angered him in his life. Seeing the dead screaming loudly in a dream may indicate that there are many debts left by the dead pending. And he wants whoever responds to him to alleviate his torment. Seeing a dead person in a dream is a true vision in general, and everything the dead person says or does in the vision is True. Because it is in the house of truth and there is no place here for lies or wishful thinking. The cry of the dead in a dream Imam al-Sadiq Seeing a dead person crying in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq means that the dreamer is warned of a certain path he is taking or intends to follow. This vision also indicates the possibility of the dreamer contracting a terminal illness in the coming period. As the cry of the dead indicates in a dream, the dreamer will fall into trouble or may owe a debt that he cannot pay. Most often, seeing the dead crying in a dream is a message to the dreamer to repent to God Almighty and abandon disobedience and transgressions. Interpretation of a dream of the dead crying and upset Seeing the dead crying and upset in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face a big problem. It indicates that the dead feels sad and sorry for him. If the dead person cries loudly and signs of anger appear on his face, this is a sign of his death from disobedience. He needs supplication and charity for God to forgive him. If a person sees in a dream that the dead person is upset with him, this is evidence that he is committing some sins that he must repent for. A dead mother crying in a dream Most often, this vision shows the mother’s anger at The life of the dreamer in general. Or his dissatisfaction with something that God knows and insists on doing. This may indicate the dreamer's lack of interest in his mother if she is alive. Or that he forgot her memory and did not contact her if she died. Also, this vision can be a warning message to the individual of the presence of danger. Or the occurrence of a serious accident or falling into some successive problems in the coming period. And if someone sees his deceased mother talking to him when she cries in a dream, this is a sign that she needs a lot of begging and charity from her children. A dead brother crying in a dream If one sees his deceased brother crying and screaming in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer has heard bad news. Or he may face a lot of trouble in the near future. And if one sees his deceased brother crying and screaming loudly in a dream, this is evidence that he is suffering from torture in
